name: John O'Connell High School
description: School Type: High School Serves grades: 9, 10, 11, 12, 13 School Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, After School Supper O'Connell features four integrated pathways; Building and Construction Trades, Entrepreneurship and Culinary Arts, Health and Behavioral Sciences, and Public Service. O'Connell offers a full range of Community School services to support students and families. They have a dedicated college and career team available to support students daily. The Wellness Center includes a full-time nurse
